cmd='/usr/bin/cmake;-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE;-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/c/Carolin.Klinger/tenstream/build/external/pfunit;-DCMAKE_Fortran_COMPILER=/usr/bin/mpif90;-DCMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS=-ffree-line-length-none -W -Wall -g                   -DUSE_MPI -fprofile-arcs -ftest-coverage;-DCMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS_RELEASE=;-DMPI_USE_MPIEXEC=YES;-DMPI=YES;-GUnix Makefiles;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>'
